docs.title: Boxel 3D Support
docs.text: This is the official modding documentation for Boxel 3D.

docs.title: How to Submit a Bug
docs.text: Please create a new issue using the official Github page: https://github.com/doppl3r/boxel-3d-support/issues

docs.title: How to Create a Mod
docs.text: In order to create a mod, you need to learn Javascript. More information coming soon.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• Control + Shift + I (Windows) - Open Inspect Element.
  • Command + Option + I (Mac) - Open Inspect Element.

docs.title: Simple outline mod
docs.text:
app.graphics.outlinePass.enabled = true
What does this do?

This mod outlines the player when they are behind an object. Provided by Doppler.
